Blog.post: suppose to be typing the blog last night...but type fan fic...too tired so nvr type blog le....but nvm....type now also can.... hum....yesterday....too tired...slept for only 2 hours....cos....do social studies until very cham....then in school is like....wow....power....i just too sleep y liao.... for the lessons before recess...i can be very very alert....very awake...but until after recess de.... even doing practical i also wan to sleep....then go back to class...have CME...i also very sleepy....worsen de...during A MAths...i remember i was looking at the board.....but i dunno why suddenly my eyes close....but Mrs Tang nvr scold me.... i think she saw me asleep ba....er.... dotz..... hopefully she dun hate me for sleeping in her A Maths class..... but really....very sleep...and the lesson very boring lor...i really regretted taking A Maths....i should have taken Literature..... haiz....sianz.... then after school...went to compass point with Brenda...cos she wan buy present for Xue Li.... we went to hallmark first....and i can say...the things there are very very very nice....i see this small pillow...on it is a strawberry...its like...i saw it....i damn excited...and wanted to buy....but no money....then i saw strawberry de hair clip...badges...wah....alot ar!!! if i have the money....i sure buy....but....er...nvm...i always having dreams that wont come true.....then went to OP shop...then i saw the slippers...wah...damn nice...especially the black OP slippers.... me and Brenda is like...gone mad....then....the pencil box also very nice....is like...suddenly i have alot of things to buy....maybe i too long nvr go out le....everytime stay at home or school.... Exams are round the corner.... i simply dun get to go out...even if go out...also go airport study...now in my brains... only got study and nth else...its like...i am going mad....i just hope my parents could give me the money to buy all the things i wan.... but sure is impossible de...they will kill me de.... haiz...i only can think of them...see them at the shop...i cant own them...sianz....:( let me see....i is like few months nvr buy new clothes le.... new shoes.... and new hair accessories.... its like..everytime go out...i wan to buy..my mummy sure is the first one to object...she will scream and shout at me.... haiz....its like...we cant touch her money like that.... if cant....then how we spend? we only can spend our dad's money? if my grandfather is here then good le...he may be very strict....but he will buy things that i wan when i go out with them....they might walk the whole day...but u can buy all u wan...but....even if they come now...i also cant go out with them... need to study all the time...haiz...how i wish i now holiday le.... O Level also pass le....then good...then i go nothing to be worried about... but...ok...nvm.... last night..something bad happen to Bren and Kiat again...i am really wondering...who is the person who con fronted Bren saying that she zhong se qing you.... if is we say de in evening class we all apologised...we only play play only....Bren...dun take it to heart...i mean...u and kiat 5 yrs then can be together...treasure each other lah..dun keep like.... becos of our problem u and him quarrel until like....haiz...just treasure each other...dun think about wat we say.... and Kiat....dun keep saying urself useless can? everyone has their own weak points.... u dun have to be sad.... try ur best to protect Bren... and dun keep accusing me say i bully Bren... know she is ur dearest.... hao le...just forgive about the past lah...ok? hum.... Yawnz!~ so tired...but just cant sleep le...cos i wake up liao.... now...i got one lyrics to type out....the song is very nice.... and i love it... it is Everytime by Britney Spears... Lyrics: Everytime by Britney Spears... notice me take my hand why are we strangers when our love is strong why carry on without me everytime i try to fly i fall without my wings i feel so small i guess i need you baby and everytime i see you in my dreams i see your face its haunting me i guess i need you baby i make believe that you are here its the only way i can see clear what i have done you seem to move on easy Everytime i try to fly i fall without my wings i feel so small i guess i need you baby and everytime i see you in my dreams i see your face its haunting me i guess i need you baby i made have made it rain please forgive me my weakness caused u pain and this song's my sorry at night i pray that soon your face will fade away everytime i try to fly i fall without my wings i feel so small i guess i need you baby and everytime i see you in my dreams i see your face its haunting me i guess i need you baby *_* Gone *_*

Hum...today...in school... nothing special ba....but just that i kana very bad flu...i finish Li Jun's tissue and Shi Ting's tissue..in the end not enough use some more...but i tolerate lor...try to stop sneezing...is it like so terrible...i cant even concentrate...haha...i know Leslie also kana flu...but he very fast recover leh...siao wan....then hum.... today.... cold like hell lor.... then...hum...funny thing always happen in English lesson or Chinese lesson...haha.... today Gibson ask... describe the action when u are happy...then is like Bryan suddenly say GAY....then Gibson is like...er... Bryan are u sure u are straight? i am starting to get worried....then Leonard say...he is not straight at all....then is like everyone start laughing....then like that....time pass very fast....then hum... after recess is physics...me and Mellisa like dunno how to do... so is like...walking around the sicence lab...asking here and there...then finally...we get it done...its like...wow... so good de feeling....then nvm....then we quickly do the graph and all...but in the end still cannot finish lah...but it is like so fun...playing with torch light..haha... like national day like that...the torch is like in either red or white...then is like we keep joking around saying celebrate national day ar.... then...after that.... CME....Mrs Ang is like not happy with Jerrome...wah...then quarrel lor...then i dun care lor...i keep writing letters to Yan Chang.... dotz...i owe her alot leh.... her letter give me is on 25th i today then give back...her present also nvr buy...so...do some diy de....then giving her my beloved teddy...one pink one blue..i giving her the PINK wan...cos she is Pinky!! i am BRAIN!!! haha.... hum...now change le... i now is strawberry Fairy liao...eh... Lao Gong ni Zai Na Li...haha..Brenda...its u... then Chang is Berry Fairy...Jalaine is Apple Fairy...wah haha...so funny...we got all sorts of character...we got Pooh Family..Animal Family, Monkey Family, Siao Family, and not... Fruit family....me n Chang got more. the main is still Pinky and the Brain...haha... then is like she keep calling me Stupid dog...its like...ok...nvm...the whole grp calls me that...wahahaha..... hum...then after school leh...i stay in class do decoration...Mrs Tang is like ...wah lau...keep rushing me...damn it sia....hate her so much!~ but nvm lah...i have done it le...she dun ever complain again...if not i going to kill her... this time de colour is Yellow....the upper part of the year is like using red...blue.... green....wah...all sorts of strong colours...now use light yellow...more pleasant...haha...but very tired lah...as usual de...then Leslie they all play on their fren...cos their fren birthday...who knows ...Mr Reduan come scold and scold...wah... shout at me too...then is like...argh..i doing deco wat..no wrong...but in the end...he walk off without ask me to leave the class...wah haha...then stay in class with Ning and Jerrome and Bren and Kiat...Kiat and Bren went off first...then left me, Ning and Jerrome lor...then after that...we go Compass point help my fren buy t shirt.... then Ning as well need to go buy note book...then saw Xin Hui, Sharon, Marilyn and more lor...then talk and talk...haha...then i saw Shi Jing Zhi Dian!!! from episode one to six..is like...i wan to buy...but not worth it...but...i sTILL WAN TO BUY! no money lah...sian... being a kid is so hard...no money no nothing.....everything no no no.... sianz..be a adult so good...i dun care... i after o level go find a job...get weekly pay de...wah..best... or if not get monthly also can...at least each month must earn 800 dollars.... wah...then good... nvm if i have to work real hard...as long as can earn lots of money can le...then i happy le.... wah hahha.... but now...still O Lvl more important lah... haiz...sianz.... end here... *_* GONE *_*

today ar....Bren,Kiat and Ning come my house.... play play and as well do project...haiz....very tired now...but got maths homework to do...need to practice maths....cos...this thursday is maths paper two....haiz...i think also fail de....i really dun have the good feeling that i will pass my o level and prelim.... haiz....Deco ...Mrs Tang also keep rushing....for nothing sia....our class also wont get prize....crazy wan leh....do so much...also get nothing....wat for..... siao wan!!!!! and now wat... my father come home give me black face....crazy...i also nvr do anything wrong....and firstly...my hp wont be high if i didnt call NKF.... if i minus away...my hp bill also just pass 100 or 90plus only....then so angry with me....dunno wat i did wrong leh...he must be so mean to me.... in school one whole day...so stress liao...now still like that...i dun even know if the charlet my teacher set up still can go anot...i think no hope liao...he sure angry wan.....last night ask de...he agree let me go...but now... i dun think he agrees....even talk to him also dun dare le....wat kind of parents is this? damn it man.... one do wrong...both kana....got hear things like...i kill that person...my my sister also kana jail wan anot....dun have right? buy one school bag also get scolding....wah lau...bag spoil wat...wat u expect me to do....now a days...not now a days....since last yr liao....things i wan to buy...most of the time is i save up le then go buy..... wat else they wan....i at least half a yr buy one time also kana scolding....then my sister buy so many things how come always nvr kana...make me so paiseh in the public...so big le...still get scolding from them.... wah lau...i am a human lor...i also got feelings de lor.... i going thru o level lor...they cant even give some supportive words... only my sister will...at least...she treat me better now.... not like my parents.... always think i am wrong.... if they dislike us so much...why born us out...just now hear my dad scold my sister...until like as if she so cheap like that.... wat...at most take my bank account de money go pay off all they wan lah! and firstly.... i going thru o level...how to go down to the shop and help? and secondly.... they love to go wat...overseas....enjoy... i dun wan to go wan lor...but wat...if i say i dun wan to go....my mother is the first one who will go mad....go overseas...spend money also wrong.... then why go overseas? then mind as well just save up the money...go sentosa or pulau ubin or wat ever place can le wat...go until so far...waste money and not worth it..... now wan to blame us? ok lah...even if we use the money...and helo... i took the most is 40...least is only extra 10.... they also make noise...i tell them i wan go work now...also cannot...all cannot...then wan me to face the book 24/7? cant be right...i also need freedom...need to relax...but no one understands!! expecially my parents.... they think they work until very tired.... i also study until very tired de lor.... every night after watching wan yu...i come back to the room to study...not sleep ok....the next day 5 am have to watch up....and all.... really sick they also think fake...then wat else can i do? go see doctor...also kana scolding.... i really wondering wat adults are thinking...cant they spare a tot for their kids? huh? we are living thing...not toys for them to scold when they are feeling bad....think wat...u think so easy to study is it... i still think work part time is more easier than all the books.... who wan to study...who dun wan to find a good job....earn alot of money....then parents old le.... i feed them...not they feed us....but they just keep thinking we cant do it.... they just think that we are good for nothing....wat the hell!! Qianning also kana like that...i also kana...Brenda also kana..... hey....wat u adults take us for? a piece of shit? or toy? truly....they had nvr really take a good look at us at all...after moving in to this condo...i could hardly talk to them... see them... i dun even dare to talk to them.... this is how family breakage happen? one happy family also become like that....wat else cant happen.... Jie... go find a job...go prove to dad and mom u are good for something...not nothing.... and i will prove to them i will pass my Os....we two work hard together...let them regret for wat they say....from now on...i am not going to bother about wat they say.... i study mine...they work theirs.... after my teacher's charlet.... i am going to leave my bloody hell parents alone...until the day they talk to me...if not...i wont even give a damn...since communicating with each other is so difficult...then mind as well dun talk.... i dun have problem... need money? i save up myself.... i dun need to tell them anything....even wat ceremony....i also wont tell them...they dun have to go.... thats all.... anyway...they just think that i wont graduate...ok lor.... fine! think that way then! i dun give a damn....so wat if u give us money? even if u give me one billion i also dun wan!! i only wan care and concern...and thats all!! nothing else!!! but u adults just cant give me!!! why!! too busy with all ur works... too busy with all ur tvs wat!!! wat my cousin wan... u all will spend all the money...like WATER!! but when we wan it...u will scold us like WATER!! words just keep flowing...then mine as well just take them as ur sons and daughters? throw me away lah!! i damn sad now lor.... i really dunnno wat to do except to do test paper...to forget all the things.... but simply...the looks they gave me are all full of hatres.... no love at all...i really wan to cry...i really really wan to cry.... as wat my fren told me...out of 10 blog...i got at least 9 blog that are sad...why.?? ASK MY PARENTS!! ask them wat they had done... i really hate them now!!! i do...i really...really do!!!! ARGH!!! *_* GONE *_*

early morning.....yesterday leh....early morning....stomache ache like hell...flu like hell...nvr go school...nvm.....today....stomache ache ok...but flu worsen....last night...dunno drink wat thing.... until i so full...and its very er xin...and i am forced to drink one big bowl....say wat...good for women....good thing lah...my sister run out right? no need to drink.... its like i took 45mins to dirnk them up....and its like..SO ER XIN!!!!today...still go PE....so good...yesterday dun have Mrs. Edison....sure wan...today confirm she will come de.... i very suay wan.... haiz... sianz...rounders again....when is the work out.... or ppl retest nafa test....haiz...sianz leh.... rounders really not my type....really.... today maths....3 periods.... but if i am not wrong....today after recess de lesson very shiok...ha...today have to stay back for remedial...and got test..siao liao...die!! amen.... forget it... need to go school le...dun wan say le.... come back then continue...bye!~ *_* Gone *_*

Haiz....now...then type blog...dun blame huh....really no choice...last night of vey no mood lah... but still act until like very happy like that.. anyway....last night quarrel with Ning over Fan Club thing....to me now...i find it real foolish of me to do such a thing...stupid me man...aiya... manager...assist manager or member....still the same...now then i know....then hai Nicole also wan to quit...lucky i stop her...if not one more last member le...all my fault sia....then after that...got one girl...bloody hell man....wan us help her she need to pay money de wat....wah...say wat...we earn money they lose money...pls lor..not easy lor....some more u so many ppl....u think very nice ar....6 to 7 ppl wan to cut into it....siao...then dun charge u all....think wat...we charity ar....siao!!! but lucky...we still can earn $180....haha...cos one is $130 another is $60...oh...is $190...wah haha...so happy...can earn money....then breakfast and lunch and dinner all frens help...but i dun think they can really do it ba.... August leh...how can....hum..but Jerrome....try ur best ok? i hope u all can come...accompany mi and ning....ok? and ning...really sorry lah.... really childish of me to quarrel over things like that....i know...sorry huh.... then.. tt thing.... still going? i hope so.... and oh ya...Jerrome...really have to thank u for the CD ....ha...thanks for the JJ Cd hor.... didnt know u will really buy it for me....haha...u buy 3 cd for me liao leh.... Ning leh? her cd how? i know u broke le...Kiat also broke le....wah...how come u boys reccently so broke huh...only Wayne so rich....hum.... u all go ask Wayne how he save money de lah...so much money...at least a $200 there leh....wow ho!~ wah ahha... anyway.... Ning.... from now on we dun quarrel liao lah... ok lah..i be the member of Wu Qian Wu Bai Liu Shi Liu can le...its ok.... more over i didnt really do anything..... so....SORRY!~ forgive ok??? ONEGAISHIMASU!~ ONEGAI!!!! er...gone...going out liao.... *_* GonE *_*

Hum....today....tired ar....go school....have test....then go k box....sing until no voice....dotz leh..... today at school...hum...nothing much happen...but Miss Chang and Miss Wong go liao.... both all very good teachers...haha....good leh...got this kind of teacher...haiz...Os coming...still dunno wat i wan to do...Tourism or Business Law??? ok....Tourism...i can travel around the world....but may die during the trip....Business Law...help wrong ppl...sure kana beat till death....also scary...wah lau....then how!!! stupid leh.... best...go Brunei...no neede work so hard...help my grandparents with the family business can liao...wah...damn gooD!!!!! wah hahaha.....ok...forget it....haha...suddenly...i start asking ppl who they like....my frens recently all behave so weird....really dunno wat they thinking.....haha...ok...nvm...recently i also very mad...dun bother about me....forget it.....hum....yesterday...Jia Jun and Syafiq fight until veri funny...my Co-form wan to ask them dun quarrel liao...in the end kana scolded...she really leh...can be funny at times...can be really irritating at times too....siao eh..... but really very funny lah... me and Ning cannot quarrel de...i mean...cannot ask quarrel de...she sure laugh wan...say my expression very funny....where got....no mah...i fierce look leh....wah...dun play play hor..... haha...today at K box so happy....sing all kinds of songs....like hokkien song.. yi zhi xiao yu san and che zhan.....haha...although hokkien no nice....but nvm lah.... haha....also no bad.... then...Sing F.I.R....Stella....Cyndi....5566...Atomic Kitten....sugar babes....Jay....wah...alot ar....haha...damn nice!! my fren Christoper ar...he sing Jay's song not bad lor....haha.... nice nice.....i think ar....all my frens sick today...but all still can sing so nice...wah haha....good good...li jun also start singing le....nice leh!!! A1 leh...keke.....ok lah...dun wan type le...i wan go watch tv liao.... byebye...

Today...got home from school quite early...but because wait for ning to finish her detention....cos taking same bus.... nvm...jerrome promise me....he this time got promise me.... say he buy le will bring to my house...in the end also dun have...wah lau...5 times liao lor...and some more... almost 3 weeks le....i still must wait until when....promise ppl de always nvr do it... still say i nvr put myself into ur shoes.... even if i am the one who is buying.... if i buy le... sure next day bring de...if not say will bring means will bring de.... i trust u again and again... then u like that.... wah....damn sad lor...i say one more time..i am not a toy for u guys to fool around with hor.... haiz.... my uncle from UK come...then how? no room lor...sian.... move my table move everything... wah lau.... sian lor... come only...need to do so much leh.... sleep only wat...kaoz.... argh.... sian lah!!! one month faster end lah...i dun wan to sleep so long in my parents room le lah!!!!!!

Going to school soon....but....there is something in my mind...that bothers me alot...alot.... last night...i received one sms...i tot i told myself to be strong...not to cry... and watever...but in the end...i still cried.... haiz...hate me also dun have to say that kind of things to my friend....take it as if i am a XXX..... and also...i have got nothing to do with u already...why bother me....why mention about me all the time to my friend.... i dun bother u....u dun bother me.... i really hate it...and really sad.... i dunno wat else that person would say to my friend....since it is nothing nice...dun say it... if not mouth rotten...u have no one to blame.... so love to XXX.... go and find one in Geylang lah.... u urself desperate... day my friend desperate..... so imaginative.... say this and that.... lie so much.... telling ppl u have this u have that.... in the end....u have nothing.... wat coffin type of bed.... ya right.... that is when u die then u need it.... saying u have alot of houses in Singapore.... saying that u going over to the States in yr 2005.... all fake...who will believe... only idiots will believe...and i am stupid enough to believe u in the first place...but now...i clever le...i wont trust ppl easily le...unless they all my good friends....but... Haiz...good fren also may not be trustful at times.... i also dun wan to mention about that thing le... if dun wan give then tell me.... waiting and waiting...wat is the point.... when u say le...dun do it.... but forget it....i will pretend as nothing happen before..... haiz... got to go to school le.... after school then come home write blog again.... Well done...my uncle and his family coming today...my room needs to be given out again...sian.... and hopefully all the things in my room is safe and sound.... my 5566 gong zai....CDs...posters....all better be in good condition...if not...i will cry and then jump down liao.... ok le...really have to go... Bye Bye... *_* Gone *_*

Hum....just back from school....suppose to go somewhere today de...but ning mummy dun allow....so...tml then go le.... hai...tired sia....today mr chan so angry with the class....almost whole class nvr bring ten yrs series.... nvm...nvr bring de go out....then.... in class de...almost all nvr do paper 2....mr chan more angry.... dun wan teach le.... er...ok lah... i nvr do some lah...stupid Bryan...say do all in the end also nvr do for me...next time evening class dun wan share books with him le..... *humph* ah...talk about Bryan...i remembersomething...last saturday...after english mock exam.... suddenly...Leslie walk to me say bryan name out and then giggle walk away..... ok...i dunno wat is happening too...but i dun care lah....Kiat and Ning sure is thing something else le.... dotz lah...dun give me anymore rumours liao can? i not even pop star...give me so many rumours got use meh? dotz.... ok...nvm...u guys are forgiven.... then...today...english lesson...wah lau...all are in exam sitting arrangement...then mrs gibson...keep wanting us to go back to the original english place...siao wan leh... make me angry for whole 2 periods.... but lucky lah... haha...nvr got call up to do the pix discussion...haha...Kiat and syafiq kana....heng ar.... ok lah... kiat de marks...is i ke lian him give him 8 de.... haha...no lah...quiet good...but how come sound so gentle? EEEE!!!! *hair stand* be more man lah...too girl liao.... *Ops* hum....kana flu for nothing today...morning time still ok...but then...come to after recess...then die le....flu worsen...then now?? ok liao....crazy wan leh my nose.... er..time to change nose le....but cannot cannot...my love my nose.... haha...represent my daddy leh...still ar... my daddy the best....wont threaten me with all kind of things...i wan to buy he let me buy...er...cheap things lah huh...not those wah...expensive like hell de things...i dun go for branded things...style and nice can le.... haha.... hum...break record is always on new yr clothes lah.... haha...but other than that...clothes is all my mummy buy de... if not i t shirt and skirt then can go out le.... eh...wait...how come talk until this...er...ok...nvm....but all i know is ...my daddy better ba....hum...mummy only good when she dun force me drink chicken soup or watever soup....so er xin...i hate herbs sia!!!!!! hum.... Jerrome later bring cd to my house...dunno real or not.... best is for real lah...if not i really wan to die le....3 weeks sia...no JJ.... can cry like hell.... Bren and Kiat...haha...more and more loving each day huh...Fri going out too hor...haha....tio spot le.... ning....dun forget photos hor.... our beloved for you song book de photo....haha....ok...then....hum.... someone NAFA test today...hum...sure fail? er...ok...no lah....sure pass de... fit fit mah... hor....keke....now.... need to save money for alot of things...like....stella cd...speed vcd...yida cd...Zhi Jing vcd part 1 and 2.... 5566 comics....and renfu book....wah...no money le...eh...Renfu book...can ask mummy to buy...haha..Mengzhe book also she buy de... keke.... cd she dun wan buy for me?? then i buy book lor... *humph* then if can...daddy buy some of the cd for me...now leh...study hard le.... now i realised...my a maths also not bad until where...today de relative velocity...i know abit..only drawing gone case nia...haha...i am sure i can make it de...i still have time to catch up... so..i must..gambatte!~ er...my frens also...all gambatte ne!~ minna....Gambatte ne!!! Oneesan...Gambatte ne!!! ok...translation...everyone...jia you!~ my dear sister...christal koay... jia you too!!! go find a good job soon...then can earn good money..then i can spend more money too....er...ok...u wont give me money de...is i give u money not u give me... ok lah...need to go do physics notes le.... er... bye bye... *_* Gone *_*

haiz....sad and happy today..... sad leh...is because i nvr go pray my ah gong...suppose to go wan...but....dotz....then leh...nvm...sad again...cos my room going to be let out for my uncle from UK to sleep...one whole month!! my room!!! *sob sob* then nvm.... go out leh.... ask my mother buy me speed de save the children vcd for me...she keep giving excuses say wat....my exam over le then buy...wat has this vcd gonna do with my exam? do this cannot do that also cannot...all under control.... buy this or buy that all have to save money myself to buy....can calculate out.... out of 14 cd....my mother only bought 2 for me....2 is fren give me de as belated birthday present...the rest all is i save money myself buy de.... then ar...nvm... dun buy cd for me....ask them buy one 5566 magazine ar...also angry with me...say i 5566 siao...if really siao is when ever they come i go chase liao...but in the end....??? i didnt even move ar... stay at home watch.... i start my revision liao...but do they know? of cos not.... they had nvr ask about my school work...just because i did not do in front of them? and they think i am not studying.... if i am not...i will be always doing fan fic le...my fan fic update also slow down alot liao.... OH YA!!! GOT GEOGRAPGHY TEST TML!!! eh...nvm...paper one nia...*beat chest* heng ar.... keke.... good good.... now... have to save money for Speed de vcd le...wah...if got some one buy for me...i tell you...i am going to love that person for life!!!! ok...come to good thing....i get to buy new colour markers!!! ok...only four...no nice colour for me to buy also...then i bought MEngzhe's book!!! my mother eventually let me buy that.... its 17 plus plus plus.... wah haha.... Ai Ai small that time also very cute leh!!! the dimples so cute!!!! WAH!~~ *eyes wide open* nvr go read it....cos i dunno how to read chinese well.... so ....haha...abit lazy to read.... then i bought one A2 size sketch book!! haha..in school can draw le...if not everytime wan to sleep in class...drawing is my best past time sia..... then...ah....forget to buy rubber... tml no rubber to use again.... have to use pen thru out liao.... eh eh.... i got new correction tape also...wah...got hard time without it man...nearly die.... good thing that tml physics only one period if not i will die.... practical leh.... i sure dunno de..... hum...Jerrome promise tml bring JJ de cd for me...hope he say le will do it...if not i sure cry in class de..... recently...someone seems to be not in contact with me...er...i think u know who le.... busy? or??? hum.... also good ba... at least on our own ways now le.... *YAWNZ* tired liao.... tml still got pe...sian lah!~ *_* GonE *_*

well well...quite a no. of days nvr update liao.....wow....today....very tired...last night whole night nvr sleep..... clean my whole room.... then nvm...Nicole...my FC member....she told me her frens mistreat her...nvm...i go e mail that grp of ppl who scold Nicole... i go tell them Dao Li....nvm...i add them into msn too.... funny....there is this girl...keep insist saying that she is ShaoWei's sister....18yrs old this yr.... the worst thing is.... the rest had eventually believe her... her name is ShaoYun...then my fren ShaoQi is Shaowei's brother le lah....ask for her father and mother name...she cant even say it out...wah lau...still say until like wat like that....worst still...she say she is 18...but she talk like 12..... WORST still...she said.. " aiyo..later wan to go nail art with Jolin... u paiseh not we paiseh wat.... more over...we also wont get to see those ppl so often...she get to see those ppl more often wat...go lor.... i dun bother lor... i had enough of all her scoldings and accusing liao.... think wat.... my mother can be so unreasonable is it.... bloody hell sia.... i just hate it lor... cant she just talk to us in a very good way... simply...she just love to shout.... shout lor...u no voice not we no voice wat.... go lah!! truly...i can love my mother so much...at times...but at times...no way.... if she dun scold...dun accuse...i think she would be the best mother i ever have le...is like...argh...i dunno how to say...i just hate her...come home only... rush into the kitchen...she is like...wah...scolding my maid liao....eh..no...my sister liao... lucky my sister temper very good ar..if my sister just now already bad mood...i think world war 3 will pop out again....and is like...wow...whole family cold war again... er...except for my and my dad or for me and my sister... my mother...definitely... ha... kana ignored lah... or if not ...all do own things lor...since she love to do that..ok lor...go lor.... she think she is the queen...keep telling me wat..in office wat... u know very tired to work anot...wat... i work from morningto night nvr stop...wah...dot dot dot.... all rubbish lah... as if my dad not like that...if ask my mother to drive around all day long...go deliver goods... deliver all the printing materials.... or go entertain the teachers...ha...i bet she cant do it lor.... and if ask her go to school early in the morning...go and study...some more is like...the books now...as if she understand a thing like that... like shit!! pls lor...she only thinks that she is the only one suffering.... pls lah...if u say u suffering...then the ppl in africa is like in hell liao lor.... say so much...kaoz! she come home...got tv...got maid....and all....she wat...still not enough? crazy nuts.... aiya... she ar...buy her own things...wah damn happy.... ask her buy something for me or my sister ar...is like ...wan her life like that.... if ask my dad to buy..wow...he sure buy...like both my nike track shoe and converse white shoe...all he buy de lor... ask my mother to buy...wah...she scold until the whole shopping mall de ppl look at u then she stop...stop le nvm...still dun buy...still remember... when i ask her to buy me a new school bag...mine is like...totally spoil le lor...totally cannot use liao lor...at first at home say i need school bag...still so happy say ok....when reach mini toons.... only a 20 dollars bag...she scold me like hell...and is like...everyone is looking at me... HELLO!! I AM 16 LE!!!! pls lah!! if ask my dad to scold her in front of everyone in the public...see how paiseh she will be lah... go into fashion....go lor...go.... eventually she go into fashion...she spend so much money on wat...facial.... dresses.... shoes... handbags.... hair.... wah...u think u rich women ar... pls lor.... her face hor...go for facial..do for dunno how many months le....still the same... i dun even see a different...ah...worse... eat all sorts of medi.... wat... vitamin C... or wat ever shit...she all buy and eat... so old le...still on diet... why? ai mei mah.. spend so much money on this kind of things...worse... these things come..not she pay...most of the time is my father pay...well done huh...well done.... Sunday go market...also wan to complain.... siao leh!! mind as well teach our maid how to drive...how to buy... then ask her every sunday go buy lor!! siao!! argh.. now damn worried about my result.... i dunno if will pass my chinese o level anot...if dun pass i sure no need to go home liao... sure sleep outside le.... siao siao liao...argh... go do notes le... *_* GONE *_* *SCARED*

ok....overslept....didnt go to school.... cos second time late le.... sure will kana discipline book wan....lucky Mrs Tang not here today...Mr Chan...doing practical today... lucky today lesson all not so important....but...one thing is.... my chinese o lvl result is out today...but i cannot see it..only tml then can see it le....now...i cry for one bloody thing.... last watch tv until 12 20am....everytime sleep so late sure can wake up wan....just this time...for no good reason...i cant wake up.... i is like...damn gulity lor.... very gulity lor.... and my bloody hell "good" mother...come and scold me until like hell...i already say...i overslept in such good tone...she is like...scolding one animal or beast like that.... wah...say until i really dun wan to go like that... is i overslept wat...and i dun wan my name to go into dicipline book wat... i have clean record lor...i dun wan a small dot there.... it will ruin me.... firstly..i did do papers.... just now...i told her i got do perlim papers...i am studying liao...she come and say...wat is the use of doing....i is like...damn it lor.... u say such thing...and say wat...i sure fail this yr.... GO AND DIE LAH! dun even encourage me and yet cursed me...only dad and jie encourage me alot...dun her mouth feel rotten....dun she feel bad when she say me until like that? pls lah... i record also help my fren do wan.... wat....say wat...she dun have me and jie as daughters....THEN WHY EVEN BOTHER TO LOOK AFTER US!! SHOULD THROW US AWAY IN THE FIRST PLACE!!!! i am really angry lor...and sad lor...my own mother...my very very very own mother...even say such a thing to me.... and she thinks she is always right... she think she scold and she angry she is the winner...have she ever think of other ppl's feeling? she is as if like a cold blooded human...all she cares is daddy...he is sick...yes...she look after him is right...but she nvr talk to me nicely before...keep saying she owe us de is it.... ya ...u did owe me...u owe me lots of care and concern...u owe me motherly-love.... i hate u!!! u had nvr say a real good sentence to me... u are always making negative comments... when had u been good to me... wat i like...wat i go after...wat i really wan... u nvr know!! u went to genting...u got me a pouch and a keychain...but is that wat i wan? ha....that isnt.... u nvr know wat i wan...nvr!! i dun go for branded stuff...i dun go for real nike...real adidas.... i am trying to be good...but they nvr know....i am studying real hard now...but they nvr know...why? come home....put bags down... change.... then eat....then tv...even wan to have a nice chat with them also cannot....i say one sentence.... they reply one word.... wow...good answer huh.... i have no good frens to talk to at all... at most... Yan Chang.... or if not left with Jie to talk to le...if not... i will have to lock myself up in the room... cry whole night...u think i love to cry is it!! who loves to cry.... i am really upset now...i am going to swear now.... december...i will not go overseas with them...since mummy say le... she only go with dad...fine...go then!! GO!! now..i wan to buy something...i save up my money... when have i start getting money from them to buy cd or buy my hair accessories.... when!! i really hate them!! i hate them!! i just wish i can be dead or something... that no more trouble will trouble me... scoldings...scoldings and scoldings... who will ever come and encourage me...pull me thru my o level.... even my PSLE...they nvr even bother anymore.... wat more will they bother? i really have no more strength to pull myself thru o level le... i really wan to give up le...since everyone think i cant do it... i really start to look down on myself le...i have no confidence at all...totally no.....all i wan to say again... i did not purposely overslept... i am really to tired le.... in school.... study is the main aim.... and nothing else.... come home...wan to take a rest.... i cant even do it...cos wat... i need to force myself to do prelim papers...although i may do it half way... but at least i did do...i just dun wan to do work in the night.... i dun wan.... and they all think i nvr study.... are my books all fake or wat.... i am just sad about wat mummy say....i am....and she dun feel gulity at all.... i just hate comparing ppls' mother with my mother.... but i have to....my frens... can be as playful as i am...they also chase 5566 alot... but their parents had nvr say that they will sure fail...their studies are no better anywhere...but their parents can just encourage them alot...alot...but mine? no way.... cos they always think i dun wan to study...they always think i chase after 5566...24/7.... pls!!! LISTEN!!! I HAVE MY LIMITS!!! I HAVE!!!!! *I HATE U MUMMY!! I HATE U DADDY!!! I HATE MYSELF!!!!* *_* Gone *_*

out...Anti-starland...is like....everyone cheer once she hold it up...its like..i so paiseh.... but... is like...so shiok lor....almost everyone there agrees with us...that all of us hate starland... but the bad thing is... starland still manage to get in with the 6th to 10th row...make the ppl at the back so sian half....all line up for like days...now is like...be come so behind...then is like i very angry lor....but i know how to control...Ning...Gladys...and the rest all keep scolding bad words...then police come say...if u ppl say some more....i will bring all of u back to the station....then is like i shouted at Ning and Gladys...say dun say le...then i carry on say.... wan to go station is it.... all just sit down...keep quiet...let them be...they will go down one day.... definitely...then both of them calm down...then some one sms one of XiaoKai fren...she shows Gladys and Serene the sms ....then is like...they stood up and look out for the Anti Starland board....
